history.text: Hello
How do you feel about batman vs superman? Its not a very fun movie I think
I'm more in to Batman I think.
Did you like Ben Affleck playing as him?
Yes, I think Ben Affleck is a great actor.
True, but I think I'd still rather watch The Dark Knight
What is Dark Knight about?
Its a batman movie, really well done, The best superhero movie out I believe.
I think I might order it tonight.
That's a good idea, much better than Batman Vs Superman, which just got very average scores.
Oh okay. I will check out some reviews
It has some very strange plotlines, Bruce wayne sees superman as a threat to humanity
Really? That sounds interesting

It could be if it was well done
. One review of the movie says "153 minutes of a grown man whacking two dolls together"
That review is odd or not?
Its not unlike many of the other ones, Apparently Lex Luther isn't portrayed very well either.
Oh okay, I'll have to see the reviews and then judge the film for myself.

Nope, I still have to convince you one way or another, this task isn't over yet :P
It only has a 27% on Ro
tten Tomatoes
And somehow, Batman gains the upper hand on superman, which technically should be impossible unless kryptonite is involved
I like a challenge and sometimes I love films with bad reviews.
Right, kryptonite!
True, it could always provide some entertainment. I think if you're a superhero movie fan then it'd be an alright watch, but otherwise it could have been done a lot better
What would you change in the film if you could?
Huh, apparently Bruce Wayne has plans to form a team of metahumans, which is not like him at all, especially with his past.
I would re-cast a couple of the characters at least
Oh okay. Any good female characters you might add to the film?
I mean, they have both Lois Lane and Martha Kent. As far as actors though, I'm so bad with names, I only really know the people in this movie
Oh okay. I haven't any clue of female actors who would be good.

uid1response.feedback: I thought I would get more information, or other movies, rather than just more plot-line

uid2response.feedback: I think the other person is knowledgeable about the film we discussed.
